Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the FBI has not made any public statement linking teachers to the antifa terrorist organization.
Lack enough support: There is no evidence or publicly available records to support the claim that teachers are the number one occupation of the antifa terrorist organization.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that antifa is a designated terrorist organization, which is not the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for the political views of teachers and their involvement in protests.
